casebody.data:
Severn P. BIZZARO, an individual; George E. Doty, an individual; and Steven P. Simmons, an individual, Appellants,
v.
HALF DENTAL FRANCHISE, LLC, a Nevada limited liability company; HDM, LLC, a Nevada limited liability company; Chayse Myers, an individual; and Matt Baker, an individual, Respondents. No. 72522 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED JULY 26, 2018

REVERSED. REMAND.
